problem: 平行四边形ABCD的周长是28cm,AC与BD相交于点O,△AOB的周长比△OBC的周长大4cm,那么AB等于()
answer: 解:∵平行四边形ABCD,∴OA=OC,OB=OD,∵平行四边形ABCD的周长是28cm,∴AB=CD,AD=BC,∴AB+BC+CD+AD=2(AB+BC)=28cm,∴AB+BC=14cm,∵△AOB的周长比△OBC的周长大4cm,∴AB+OA+OB-(BC+OB+OC)=AB-BC=4cm,∴AB=9cm．故选:B．
comment: 此题考查了平行四边形的性质:平行四边形的对角相互相平分,对边相等．解此题时要注意方程思想的应用．
problem_en: The perimeter of the parallelogram ABCD is N_0, AC and BD intersect at point O, the perimeter of △AOB is N_1 larger than the perimeter of △OBC, then AB is equal to ()
